question: Which of the following was the main reason of the downfall of Mauryan Empire?
option1: Weak successors of Ashoka who could not control the empire properly
option3: Ashoka maintained friendly relations with his neighbors
answer: Weak successors of Ashoka who could not control the empire properly
explanation: Some causes appear were the weak successors, vastness of the empire, independence of the provinces, foreign invasion, and internal revolt. The Maurya Empire fell because of these causes.
